channel.title: Spanish Help
channel.description:
Hey guys, I am in Spanish 10 right now sooo yeah.. I need help with deciding between Imperfect or Preterite verbs.
1) Cuando el desfile empezo, todos los ninos (esperaron/esperaban) al lado de las calles. ----- I picked esperaron because it is saying when the parade started, which only occurred once and not multiple times. I think ESPERARON is right but I just need some reassurance
2) Nosotros (teniamos/tuvimos) cinco anos cuando (fuimos/ibamos) a la escuela por primera vez. ----- For this one I chose teniamos because kids turn 6 ALL the time I chose fuimos because they only start school once. I am not sure at all on this one, any ideas?
3) El escritorio que mi mama tenia de joven (fue/era) antiguo. ----- I chose era on this one, because... well it just sounds right lol. I have no idea which to choose on this one, help?
4) Todos mis parientes (bailaron/bailaban) cuando llegamos a la fiesta. ----- I chose bailaban for this one because it says Todos, but I am also not entirely sure since it doesn't specify if the fiestas occur all the time or not.
5) Mi pariente favorito de nino (fue/era) mi Abuela Susana. ----- Also not sure which to choose for this one
6) Cuando (termino/terminaba) la clase, (habia/hay) muchos estudiantes emocionados ----- Lost on this one as well
Someone help please :(( thanks!!

item.title: Spanish Help
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

x Albi x:

EYYY OMBRE[/quote][quote=“Pwnd, post:3, topic:553363”]HUEVOS PUTO

item.title: Spanish Help
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

Hey guys, I am in Spanish 10 right now sooo yeah.. I need help with deciding between Imperfect or Preterite verbs.

  1. Cuando el desfile empezo, todos los ninos (esperaron/esperaban) al lado de las calles.
    ----- I picked esperaron because it is saying when the parade started, which only occurred once and not multiple times. I think ESPERARON is right but I just need some reassurance CORRECT

  2. Nosotros (teniamos/tuvimos) cinco anos cuando (fuimos/ibamos) Nosotros (teniamos/tuvimos) cinco anos cuando.
    ----- For this one I chose teniamos because kids turn 6 ALL the time I chose fuimos because they only start school once. I am not sure at all on this one, any ideas? CORRECT

  3. El escritorio que mi mama tenia de joven (fue/era) antiguo.
    ----- I chose era on this one, because… well it just sounds right lol. I have no idea which to choose on this one, help? “Fue” is correct because it means was which makes more grammatical sense.

  4. Todos mis parientes (bailaron/bailaban) cuando llegamos a la fiesta.
    ----- I chose bailaban for this one because it says Todos, but I am also not entirely sure since it doesn’t specify if the fiestas occur all the time or not. “Bailron” is right not Bailban.

  5. Mi pariente favorito de nino (fue/era) mi Abuela Susana. “Era”
    ----- Also not sure which to choose for this one

  6. Cuando (termino/terminaba) la clase, (habia/hay) muchos estudiantes emocionados The statement says "when class ended, there were many excited students. Use “termino” and “Habia”.
    ----- Lost on this one as well

Someone help please :(( thanks!!

I have about 4 years of high school Spanish but Good job for the most part. I edited the quote for your help.

Oh ffs this is from sept 2015 nevermind.

Read full topic
